L2_gloss: (chiefly Ripuarian) bare; naked; uncovered; said of
(chiefly Ripuarian) to speak; to talk, Mer kalle, wie
A nickname for Jakob, A waiter, especially the head
empty; not full, Mer koofen ongerwäs noch en Fläsch
(Ripuarian, auxiliary) must; to have to; should, Du
(Ripuarian) to write, Ich hann däne jeschrevve, datt
(most dialects) shall; should; to be supposed to; expressing
(most dialects) week, Hä es vür vier ov sechs Woche
